info.name: product-relations-rest-api
info.description:
Several products exist in the system:

Abstract product abstract {abstractSKU1} with a product relation of type "related-products". Product relation has two products {relatedSKU1} and {relatedSKU2}.

Another product abstract {abstractSKU2} with a product relation of type "related-products". Product relation has product {relatedSKU1} and deactivated product {relatedSKU3}.

Third product abstract {abstractSKU3} has no relation.

Fourth product abstract {abstractSKU4} has no relation of type "related-products", but has one of type "up-selling".

Fifth product abstract {abstractSKU5} has many (e.g. more than 20) products in "related-products" relation.
